name: Indistinguishable from Atrophy
description:
warning: this game contains themes of death and violence.

you are a hunter who has found themselves in a bear trap. your only chance of survival is someone - no, something. it craves what's under your skin. will you resist the stranger with bloodied hands, or will you give in to the one sliver of hope that you have?

features:

  • 1 CG
  • 999 words
  • 2 endings

based in the art without blood universe. you do not need to play any of the other games in this world to play this one.

music by zack valence

sound effect by zapsplat

submitted for the o2a2 - queer edition jam. this jam limits developers to 1 CG, 1 BGM, 1 sound effect, and 1k words.
